summary: Tired of Lydia having that boring set of armor? Ever wanted her to have different hair? Trying to get that one-of-a-kind companion? Then look no Further! With the Enhanced Lydia Mod! Simply Download and Install to enjoy a companion that can hold her own in a fight and look good too!
descriptionHtml:
Tired of Lydia having that boring set of armor? Ever wanted her to have different hair? Trying to get that one-of-a-kind companion? Then look no Further! With the Enhanced Lydia Mod! Simply Download and Install to enjoy a companion that can hold her own in a fight and look good too!

Alternate Calder Finished: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6258

Changes to Lydia
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Changed her class to Spellsword
2. Changed her default outfit to nightingale armor
3.Set her to essential
4. Changed her default mood to happy :D
5. Changed some of her base skills to better levels
6. Gave her a Daedric Sword and Bow w/ arrows
7. Added spell: Vampiric Drain (Temporary, until i change it to a better spell)
8. Changed Hair color to Dark Blonde and eye color to Amber
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Installation
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Download off the Skyrim Nexus
2. Extract .rar file into your Skyrim Directory\'s Data Folder
(for Steam users, C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data     
or C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data)
if prompted press yes to merge folder meshes.
3. Open your Skyrim Launcher and click Data Files
4. Check that Alternative Lydia 1.0.0 .esp is ticked
5. Run and Enjoy
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Issues
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If the mod is removed or disabled, Lydia will still have the armor and weapons equiped,
to fix this take any items you have given her back and then press the tilde key ` click on Lydia and type
\"resetinventory\" and \"resetai\"  with no quotation marks.

This mod conflicts with The Housecarls more feminine stance by sugaki by making her able to be killed, to avoid this turn off the Housecarls more feminine stance when you use this mod
